text:
Hey guys, it’s Ro! I wanted to make another
announcement video and…

I know, I know, I know, I just made an announcement
video last week, but,

there are just so many things going on and
I’m so excited about them and
I wanted to keep you guys in the loop.

The first announcement is about Stream Con,
I have teamed up with my publisher

because I really wanted to do something special
for you guys.

So I’m doing a sweepstakes where you and
a friend can win a fully paid

trip to come hang out and meet me at Stream
Con!

We’ll provide the plane tickets, hotel stay,
passes to the event and
two signed Nerdy Nummies Cookbooks!

There will also be a VIP meet and greet, where
we’ll get to hang out, and
dance around if we want to… I don’t know!
Whatever happens!

So that’s the grand prize for you and a
friend but there will also be

five runner ups who will get a signed book
and a poster!

All of the details will be on NerdyNummiesCookbook.com
and just a reminder,

anyone who pre-orders the book is eligible
and if you have already ordered the

book, you can go to NerdyNummiesCookbook.com
to enter the sweepstakes!

Second announcement, I’m gonna be in a music
video!

My very talented friend Dawin made a song
called Dessert and I love it!

It’s so catchy and, the name of the song
is dessert, you guys!
You probably know I’m gonna like it!

Just shot the music video the other day,
it was me, Dawin, Silento,

having fun in the sun, I’m not exactly sure
when the video comes out, but as soon
as I do, I’ll let you guys know!

Third announcement is collabs! I have been
doing a ton of them lately and

having so much fun! And in case you missed
any of them I’ll put links down below,
for you to go check ‘em out.
I got to make a Pizza Cake with Grace Helbig!

I baked My Little Pony Cupcakes with Austin
Mahone!

Mixed up a Harry Potter Drink with Mamrie
Hart!

Made Delicious Strawberry Adventure Time Tarts
with Lindsey Stirling!

Played Baby Food and Ice Cream sandwiches
with Kurt Hugo Schneider!

Had some fun with my sister Mo doing the candy
assembly and soda challenges!

And also had my friend TJ over to play the
Pocky Challenge!

I’m having so much fun doing collabs, let
me know in the comments down below if

there’s anyone that you would like to see
me collab with, because…
I’m having a blast!

Also, I wanted to give you guys a sneak peek
to next week’s Nerdy Nummies,

I’ve never given a sneak peak before, but,
I wanted to show you guys because
I’m just so excited!
Ro: Adorable! Dawin: Hey guys, how do I look?
Ro: Watch out Professor Snape! Dawin’s here!

Dawin stopped by my house and we made some
Harry Potter Treats,
so that’s coming up next!

Fourth announcement is that we just reached
One… Billion… Views!
That’s Billion, with a “B”!
Like, B, Beluga Whale!

I never thought that when I started making
Videos for fun and started a little

baking show four years ago, that it would grow
into such a wonderful community.

You guys are amazing! I just really want to
thank you guys for all the love and

support over the years, because, it’s because
of you guys, that I get to do what
I love and make all these videos.

So, thank you, thank you, thank you, thank
you, thank you, thank you!

Muh-mm-mm-mm-mm-mm-mm-mm-mm! Oh gross Ro!
Stop! Gross! You’re embarrassing me!
Muh-mm-mm-mm-mm-mm-mm-mm-mm! Pfft! Sorry!

The last announcement is more of an update,
it’s about Cookie, my French Bulldog.

You guys have been asking me for updates about
her and I actually have some news.

After a lot of training, she now knows how
to do another trick.

She can now do high-five so I thought it would
be funny to show you guys her

little tricks! She can now sit, lie down,
and high five!

This is big news in Cookie World, I mean for
her, this is like, a big deal.
Down. Sit, and now… High Five!
Good girl! Good high five! Good high five!

And you should let me know down below which tricks I
should teach her next, I really like

training her because we get to have time together
and bond and it’s fun!

That’s it for announcements, I hope to see
you at Stream Con and as soon as

I know any new Tour Dates or locations I will
let you know. So again you can

leave me comments and let me know what cities
you’d like me to come visit
because we are still figuring that out.

And, as soon as the music video comes out
with Dawin, I will let you guys know!
I’m so excited for it!

And… A billion views?!?! You guys, this
is amazing! You guys are amazing!
Alright, thanks everyone, bye-bye!
Doo-doo-doo-doo-doo-doo-doo-doo!
